title: Help with font ID
content:
Hi guys,

Could someone tell me the name of the typeface used in this logo?

Many thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110348im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KirkerCompany_5268.png)
author: kirker

comments.content: That’s fantastic thanks. Is the ampersand ITC Garamond or is it something else?
